title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for chatting with Ollama models, embeddings, and async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with multi-user, model management, and RAG uploads.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing sync/async APIs, streaming, and embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API, supporting chat and embeddings.

title: ollama-cli (node)
summary: NPM package adding a friendly interactive CLI wrapper around the Ollama API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like code-completion service powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team enabling local LLM nodes in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel service provider and facade for chatting with Ollama models from PHP.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-made docker-compose stacks bundling Ollama with WebUI, Postgres vector DB, and RAG extras.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and embeddings.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Go client library generated from OpenAPI spec for integrating Ollama into Go services.

title: modelforge (ollama plugin)
summary: CLI tool that converts Hugging Face models into Ollama-compatible Modelfile format and pushes to registry.

title: ollama-embeddings
summary: Utility repo showing how to generate and store embeddings with Ollama for semantic search demos.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that brings local LLM chat to Discord servers using Ollama backends.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Bolt-js Slack bot integrating Ollama for private or channel-based LLM conversations.
